name: Whiskey & Zombies
description:
WHISKEY & ZOMBIES is a fun and intense brawler with a fair amount of stealther strategy involved as you need to try and escape a very different zombie apocalypse. Turns out that only whiskey moonshine can kill the virus so you need to stay drunk while you brawl, drink, sneak, scavenge, and rage your way through the Deep South. But the more you drink - the harder the game gets.  And it is a really hard game.

There will be comedy mixed action together with suspense and nail-biting moments that could easily turn into a screaming, button-mashing frenzy.  You can play a solo or grab some friends and create some whiskey-fueled zombie-mayhem together in local multiplayer.  And if someone turns zombies, all it takes is a bottle to bring them back.

The survival of the human race now rests on the last southern family who knows how to make the whiskey moonshine -  the McCrearys -  a bunch of permadrunk, bootlegging rednecks who all dislike each other.  You must now help them get home to the Louisiana swampland and their illegal moonshine still - to save humanity.  

FEATURES______________________________________________________________________________

  • Top-Down Mayhem: There will be comedy, suspense, and intense mayhem as you slug, swing, and shoot your way through the hordes of undead just waiting to take a bite out of your thinking-noodle..
  • Unique Drunk System: Stay drunk to stay alive.  But be careful, the “safer” you are the harder the game gets.  Unless you play as You have to keep drinking whiskey but always check your levels… too much and you’re in trouble as your accuracy takes a toll, too little and you not only risk the virus, but your stamina is shot to hell.
  • Different Characters & Abilities: Play as one of the 4 McCrearys, each of them very different and unique traits.  Some are slow and powerful while others are light and fast but can’t hold their whiskey very well.
  • Story-Driven: Discover and learn of the McCrearys’ Southern roots and their individual motivations as you help them on their way through the ass-end of Louisiana to their home in the Bayou.
  • Fun but Challenging: It might be easy to sneak around and rack up a few kills, but the more you progress - the more resistance you will meet.

WHEN YOU BUY THE GAME__________________________________________________________
